alert.note: Alert for St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 10:17AM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Accumulations in excess of 4 inches are possible in western portions of these counties. Northwest wind gusts of 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lagrange and Noble Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Highly variable roadway conditions and visibility have been reported. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
